titleStmt.title: A maruelous hystory intitulede, beware the cat Conteyning diuers wounderfull and incredible matters. Very pleasant and mery to read.
Beware the cat.
titleStmt.author: Baldwin, William, ca. 1518-1563?

publicationStmt.publisher: In Fleetestrete at the signe of the Faulcon by Wylliam Gryffith: and are to be sold at his shop in S. Dunstons Church-yarde,

notesStmt.note: Dedication signed: G. B. [i.e. Gulielmus Baldwin].
In 1864, Halliwell printed a manuscript transcript of an edition with colophon: J. Alde, sold by J. Arnold, 1570.--STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop in S. Dunstons Church-yarde
